name: RushLimbaughMorningUpdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A short update from Rush Limbaugh to get you caught up on what you need to know today. Updated daily. 

After enabling this skill, say “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear Rush Limbaugh content in your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to edit the order of content feeds in your news update.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
